name: Unit 51
description:
Unit 51 is a first person shooter game where your goal is to reach end of the level while flying machines are shooting at you. If the projectiles hit you your health decreases and if you lose all your health you are transported to the start.  Use the boxes in the level to take cover.

Collect the glowing cube at the end of the level to finish the level where you will be given an option to play again with harder difficulty. 

This is a game made using unreal engine 4 and C++.
